tools package¶

Submodules¶

tools.conunit module¶

Convert string with unit to number.

tools.conunit.convlen(length)¶

Convert length ended with unit

Parameters:length (str) – length in string
Returns:length in floating num
Return type:float

Examples:

convlen('2um')

tools.genarray module¶

Generate a list from string input that might include unit such as um.

tools.genarray.getarray(str_array)¶

Get number array or list from string.

Parameters:str_array (str) – a str array
Returns:number
Return type:float

Example:

getarray('2:2:8')

or:

getarray('2um:2um:8um')

tools.myconst module¶

Define constants globally
